com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware.part

Class UltrasonicSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogChannel
        • com.midlocanics.frc.gongaware.part.UltrasonicSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource

    public class UltrasonicSensor
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.AnalogChannel
    Class representing the MAX Ultrasonic Sensor. Uses the value of 9.8mV/in to determine the distance.
    Author:
    Ross Gongaware
